about_the_game:
◆ 3D Renders, Illustrations and Animations!


◇ 280+ high-quality 4k images in JPG format
◇ 18 Animations

◆NOTE: To access the Digital Artbook:


1. Right click "Sky Resort - Delphi & Jessy" in the Steam Library
2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
3. Open the "Artbook" folder

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an ADULT game meant to be played by a mature audience only.

It includes explicit, sexual material that some viewers may find offensive.

The story contains Public Sex, Threesome, Cum Inflation Futanari on Female, and Futanari on Futanari content.

The characters depicted and shown in the game are over 18 years old.
